ygData.subject: Re: Kill Stealing
ygData.msgSnippet: This whole discussion from your excuse ridden POV is just hilarious. Well heads up buddy when I group I usually direct the group from the rear-vantage point
ygData.messageBody:
This whole discussion from your excuse ridden POV is just hilarious. Well
heads up buddy when I group I usually direct the group from the rear-vantage
point and I go out of my way to kill whiners like you. Oh, what you say? On
a non-pvp server? You bet and anyone can do it(the train idea is only 1
way....).

Apparently you've already wrecked your reputation enuff that you may never
find a group. I can't count the times I've started a group or been asked to
group EVERY time I'm in the game. As it has been said on this list more
times than I can count: Shouting is not the best way to find a group or form
a group. You apparently aren't trying hard enuff, don't care, lack social
graces, or are just a loser(pick one).

I can solo thru lvl 25 with rarely a problem if I had trouble finding a
group. I suggest you find one of these spots and get to whatever level you
can cause you won't be able to get the full enjoyment out of the game being
an ass. Good luck with your 25th lvl solo character. After the ignorance
you've shown in your letters I'm not even gonna tell you how to turn your
reputation around. Start a new character....this ones going nowhere...


Cinius Shade Master of the 6th Circle(Mith Marr)




_______________________________________________________
Get your free, private email at http://mail.excite.com/
